question.q: Are you satisfied with the maintenance services?
Are you satisfied with the maintenance quality of the mobile phone which you sent to Calcare?
Are you satisfied with the time it took to repair your phone?
Are you satisfied with our service staff's attitude during service?
Did you pay for the maintenance service this time?
question.qm: Compared to your expectation, are you satisfied with the maintenance cost?
